DOC.brief_summary: To compare corneal stain contact lens instillation new MPS vs. RepleniSH
DOC.brief_title: Comfort Evaluation New MPS vs. Replenish Contact Lens Patients
DOC.criteria: 1 . Patients 18 yrs old 2 . Males females 3 . Any race ethnic background 4 . CL patient use MPS product currently 5 . Patients use Contact Lenses habitually ( least 1 month ) 1 . Corneal refractive surgery within 6 month study . 2 . Contact lens use day examination . 3 . Corneal ectasia . 4 . Current use Restasis
